name: The Journal of a Lonely Moon
name_original: The Journal of a Lonely Moon
description:
The Game:

After being downgraded, Pluto refused to ever speak with the other planets again. The Moon, who was best friends with Pluto, has been destraught ever since.

The Moon decides to turn towards the other planet for comfort, unsure if it can ever find happines and a place in the cosmos once more.

The Journal of a Lonely Moon is a short narrative driven game that features themes of friendship, loss, lonliness and isolation.

Controls: 

Movement : W A S D

Interact / Advance Dialogue : SPACE

Choose Dialogue Options : NUMBER KEYS (not numpad keys tho)

Disclaimer: This is a narrative piece that uses the planets in our solar system as characters. This is in no way scientifically accurate, and does not intend to be.
